page.title: 17NEW DEVELOPMENT IN HOUNSLOW
page.content: After many years of discussions Hounslow High Street is being { {redeveloped.}The Town Hall,swimming baths and many houses have been demolished.At present the High Street is a noisy, dusty and dirty place while building is in progress.Building started at the beginning of July 1985 It is due to be{finished}by{Christmas {1987.}The new shopping centre will have a{department store, supermarket {and 40 shops}with loading bays,on three levels.There will be a new library,theatre and conference hall.Later planning will{pedestrianise the High Street.We{surveyed}shoppers and found most people are pleased about the new development,and want departmental and food shops.Many people said they would like a {Leisure {Centre.}No definite plans have been made for one yet!
